content: this gorgeous cerise infinity scarf is quick and easy to work up and is made with knit picks chroma worsted yarn in the dragon lily colorway this pattern is one of the september contributions to the 2023 scarf of the month cal > this pattern is available for free on > my blog or purchase the ad-free pdf as > a digital download above **materials ** * approximately 290 yds of category 4 medium weight yarn i used knit picks chroma worsted* in the dragon lily colorway * size j 6 mm furls streamline zodiac aries crochet hook * yarn needle for weaving ends * scissors
